TopicTitle: You must use the object that is on your left hand to save a doomed spaceship.

Articles.Content:
a glass of nothing but air? mmmmmmmmmm...

Maybe a new page will save the doomed spaceship!

Edited February 12, 2022 by Venusian Explorer
I’m currently using my left hand to support my hone while I type, I will use it to edit the ships code to fight off the cyber attack on the ships comms systems

Nothing...

I doubt the ship can be saved. Might as well just head for the escape pods.
I am holding the doomed starship in my left hand, I put it down gently and it is saved.

keyboard

missing sas

fail

A can of Irn-Bru.

man i'm dead
Even if you count air, and maybe a few dead skin cells as an object you can hold in your hand, I doubt we can save this ship with it.
A remote is not an ideal tool.
My keyboard handrest? Hmmm. Yep, we're just about doomed.
A mirror Rubix's cube. The ship is dead, but might as well play with something before it crashes.
Well we might be dead but at least we know how many steps it took to get there.
I have a microphone, so at least I can alert the rest of the crew and anyone else we can contact that we're doomed.
